    mem_register_test.asm

    Declare arrays 

                
.data
    x DB 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
    y DW 2, 54, 32, 8
    z DD 10 DUP (50)

    Storing values into memory using register arithmetic 

                
.text
	mov eax, 6
	mov [eax], x[2]
	mov [eax+2], y[3]
	mov [ebx], z
